content.text:
I will create a backup of the config file by copying its content to a new file named "config_backup.json". 

Let's proceed with this task.
I have read your config file content. As I cannot directly write files, you can create a backup file named "config_backup.json" with the following content:

```json
{
  "database": "sqlite://app.db",
  "debug": true
}
```

If you want, I can assist you with the exact command or code snippet to create this backup.
